mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, mobile, email, password, salt, nickname, sex, birthday, detail_address, headimg, user_money, user_money_limit, frozen_money, pay_point, rank_point, reg_time, reg_ip, last_time, last_ip, mobile_supplier, mobile_province, mobile_city, reg_from, surplus_password, pay_pwd_salt, user_status, pass_wrong_count, user_type, is_real, user_remark, is_business, passsign
mapper.insert:
insert into dl_market_data (id, channel, date_time, count_user, count_order, amount_sum, count2, count3, count7, count15, count30, count90, count180, count360, add_time) values (
)
mapper.update:
update
set password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, detail_address = #{detail_address}, headimg = #{headimg}, user_money = #{user_money}, user_money_limit = #{user_money_limit}, frozen_money = #{frozen_money}, pay_point = #{pay_point}, rank_point = #{rank_point}, reg_ip = #{reg_ip}, last_ip = #{last_ip}, mobile_supplier = #{mobile_supplier}, mobile_province = #{mobile_province}, mobile_city = #{mobile_city}, surplus_password = #{surplus_password}, pay_pwd_salt = #{pay_pwd_salt}, pass_wrong_count = #{pass_wrong_count}, user_status = #{user_status}, user_type = #{user_type}, is_real = #{is_real}, user_remark = #{user_remark} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(1) todayCount from dl_market_data where to_days(from_unixtime(add_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) = to_days(now())

select channel as channel, date_time, sum(count_user) as count_user, sum(count_order) as count_order, sum(amount_sum) as amount_sum from dl_market_data where add_time >= #{pd.lastStart1} AND add_time <= #{pd.lastEnd1} group by channel

select.if: select count(DISTINCT a.user_id) as count from ( SELECT user_id from dl_order where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7','9') GROUP BY user_id HAVING min(add_time) >= #{pd.lastStart1} and min(add_time) <= #{pd.lastEnd1} ) a where a.user_id in ( SELECT user_id from dl_order where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7','9') and add_time >= #{pd.lastStart2} and add_time <= #{pd.lastEnd2})

mapper.select: SELECT sum( k.count_user ) count_user, sum(count_order) count_order, sum( k.total_money ) amount_sum, k.channel device_channel, k.channel_name channel FROM ( SELECT count( u.mobile ) count_user, 0 AS count_order, 0 AS total_money, p.channel channel, p.channel_name FROM dl_user u LEFT JOIN dl_phone_channel p ON u.device_channel = p.channel WHERE u.reg_time >= #{pd.lastStart1} AND u.reg_time <= #{pd.lastEnd1} GROUP BY p.channel UNION SELECT 0 count_user, count(distinct o.mobile) AS count_order, sum( o.money_paid ) total_money, u.device_channel channel, p.channel_name FROM dl_order o LEFT JOIN dl_user u ON o.mobile = u.mobile LEFT JOIN dl_phone_channel p ON p.channel = u.device_channel WHERE o.pay_status = 1 AND o.order_status != 10 AND o.add_time >= #{pd.lastStart1} AND o.add_time <= #{pd.lastEnd1} AND u.reg_time >= #{pd.lastStart1} AND u.reg_time <= #{pd.lastEnd1} GROUP BY channel ) k GROUP BY k.channel

select distinct(c.first_add_seller_id) last_add_seller_id, (select count(1) from dl_customer c1 where c1.first_add_seller_id = c.first_add_seller_id and month(FROM_UNIXTIME(c1.last_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = #{pd.curMonth} ) curPersons, (select count(1) from dl_customer c2 where c2.first_add_seller_id = c.first_add_seller_id ) totalPersons from dl_customer c where c.distribute_state = 1

SELECT sysUserId,SUM(moneyPaid) curMoneyPaid,eveMon,pay_status,order_status,distribute_state FROM (SELECT cc.last_add_seller_id sysUserId, o.money_paid moneyPaid, FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time, '%Y-%m' ) eveMon, o.pay_status pay_status, o.order_status order_status, cc.distribute_state distribute_state
FROM dl_customer cc LEFT JOIN dl_order o ON cc.mobile = o.mobile WHERE o.add_time > 1546272000 AND cc.mobile IN (SELECT c.mobile FROM dl_customer c WHERE last_add_seller_id = #{last_add_seller_id})) temp WHERE pay_status = 1 AND order_status != 10 AND distribute_state = 1 GROUP BY sysUserId,eveMon;

select distinct(c.last_add_seller_id) last_add_seller_id, FROM_UNIXTIME( c1.last_add_time, '%Y-%m' ) eveMon, (select count(1) from dl_customer c1 where c1.last_add_seller_id = c.last_add_seller_id and month(FROM_UNIXTIME(c1.last_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = #{curMonth} and c1.distribute_state = 1) curPersons, from dl_customer c and c.distribute_state = 1

select count(1) curPersons,FROM_UNIXTIME( last_add_time, '%Y-%m' ) eveMon,last_add_seller_id from dl_customer where first_add_seller_id = #{last_add_seller_id} group by FROM_UNIXTIME( last_add_time, '%Y-%m' )
select mobile from dl_customer where last_add_seller_id = #{last_add_seller_id} and distribute_state = 1 and user_id is not null

SELECT SUM( bonus_price ), FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time, '%Y-%m' ) FROM dl_user_bonus WHERE bonus_status = 1 AND receive_time > 1546272000 AND user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM dl_customer WHERE distribute_state = 1 AND last_add_seller_id = '2fee55b7fcbb4731b875164a466e6335' ) bonus_status = 1 GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time, '%Y-%m' );

SELECT sum( bonus_price ) totalBonus FROM dl_user_bonus bonus WHERE bonus_status = 1 AND receive_time > 1546272000 and bonus.user_id IN
#{item}
select user_id from dl_customer where last_add_seller_id = #{last_add_seller_id} and distribute_state = 1

select mobile, reg_time, reg_from, pc.channel_name as phone_channel, dl_user.device_channel from
left join dl_phone_channel pc on pc.channel = dl_user.device_channel where 1=1
AND reg_time >= #{pd.lastStart1}
AND reg_time <= #{pd.lastEnd1}
and mobile like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.mobile1}),'%')
and channel like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.channel}),'%')
order by dl_user.reg_time DESC
SELECT SUM(bonus_price) FROM dl_user_bonus WHERE user_id = #{pd.user_id} AND bonus_status = 0

SELECT a.user_id AS user_id, a.user_name AS user_name, a.mobile AS mobile, b.id_code AS id_code, b.real_name AS real_name FROM dl_user a LEFT JOIN dl_user_real b ON a.user_id = b.user_id where b.is_delete = 0

SELECT COALESCE(count(distinct od.user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(od.money_paid),0) as amount, COALESCE(sum(od.ticket_amount),0) as amountTicket FROM dl_user_real ur left join dl_order od on ur.user_id = od.user_id and DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(ur.add_time),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(od.add_time),'%Y-%m-%d') where od.order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') and ur.add_time > #{pd.lastStart1} and ur.add_time < #{pd.lastEnd1} and ur.is_delete = 0

SELECT COALESCE(count(distinct us.user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(od.money_paid),0) as amount, COALESCE(sum(od.ticket_amount),0) as amountTicket FROM dl_user us left join dl_user_real ur on us.user_id = ur.user_id left join dl_order od on us.user_id = od.user_id and DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(us.reg_time),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(od.add_time),'%Y-%m-%d') where DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(us.reg_time),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(ur.add_time),'%Y-%m-%d') and od.order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') and us.reg_time > #{pd.lastStart1} and us.reg_time < #{pd.lastEnd1} and ur.is_delete = 0
select * from dl_user where mobile = #{mobile} and app_code_name = 10
select * from dl_user where mobile = #{mobile} and app_code_name = 11

select user_id from dl_user where mobile in
#{item}

SELECT COALESCE(count(distinct us.user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(ur.amount),0) as amount from dl_user us left join dl_user_recharge ur on us.user_id=ur.user_id where DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(us.reg_time),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(ur.add_time),'%Y-%m-%d') and ur.status=1 and us.reg_time > #{pd.lastStart1} and us.reg_time < #{pd.lastEnd1}

SELECT COALESCE(count(distinct od.user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(od.money_paid),0) as amount,getUserByMobile COALESCE(sum(od.ticket_amount),0) as amountTicket FROM dl_user us left join dl_order od on us.user_id = od.user_id and DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(us.reg_time),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(od.add_time),'%Y-%m-%d') where od.order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') and us.reg_time > #{pd.lastStart1} and us.reg_time < #{pd.lastEnd1}

SELECT count(user_id) AS count,COALESCE(sum(amount),0) AS amount from ( SELECT count( DISTINCT od.order_sn ) AS count, sum( od.money_paid ) AS amount , sum( od.ticket_amount ) AS amountTicket , od.user_id FROM dl_user us LEFT JOIN dl_order od ON us.user_id = od.user_id AND DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( us.reg_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( od.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) WHERE od.order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') and us.reg_time > #{pd.lastStart1} and us.reg_time < #{pd.lastEnd1} GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(od.order_sn)>1 )a
SELECT * from dl_user where mobile = #{mobile} and app_code_name = #{app_code_name}

SELECT 1 store_id, '圣和彩店' as name,user.user_id, user.user_name, user.nickname,user.mobile,user.user_money money,user.user_money_limit money_limit,user.passsign from dl_user user where mobile = #{mobile} and app_code_name = #{app_code_name}
mapper.update: update dl_user set user_money_limit = user_money_limit + #{user_money_limit} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT sum( user_money_limit ) user_money_limit, sum( user_money ) user_money FROM dl_user;
